title: Bloomberg Markets: Becker on Smoke Impact on California Wine
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Becker on Smoke Impact on California Wine
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Scott Becker President Kosta Browne Discussing the business of California winemaking and the impact of the recent wildfires.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
